Title: Au Revoir L'Ete
Actors: Fumi Nikaidou, Mayu Tsuruta, Taiga, Kanji Furutachi
Plot: After failing her university entrance exam, Sakuko is invited by her aunt Mikie to spend summer vacation in a beautiful seaside town. Sakuko gets to know the people of the town, including Takashi, a shy relative of her childhood friend.
